mapper.select: SELECT ts.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM pret_translated_s WHERE evaluationvalue_s < 5 AND memberid != #{memberid} ORDER BY translatednum_s ASC ) ts JOIN pret_request_s rs ON ts.requestnum_s = rs.requestnum_s LEFT JOIN pret_evaluation_s es ON ts.translatednum_s = es.translatednum_s AND es.memberid = #{memberid} WHERE rs.memberid <> #{memberid} AND es.translatednum_s IS NULL AND ROWNUM = 1

SELECT tm.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM pret_translated_m WHERE evaluationvalue_m < 5 AND memberid != #{memberid} ORDER BY translatednum_m ASC ) tm JOIN pret_request_s rm ON tm.requestnum_m = rm.requestnum_m LEFT JOIN pret_evaluation_m em ON tm.translatednum_m = em.translatednum_m AND em.memberid = #{memberid} WHERE rm.memberid <> #{memberid} AND em.translatednum_m IS NULL AND ROWNUM = 1
